subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS, Oct. 3 (AP) — Walt Jocketty is out after 13 seasons as the general manager of the St. Louis Cardinals, a year after they won the World Series for the first time since 1982.
snippet: ST. LOUIS, Oct. 3 (AP) — Walt Jocketty is out after 13 seasons as the general manager of the St. Louis Cardinals, a year after they won the World Series for the first time since 1982.
